name: Satoshi Nakamoto
bio: Satoshi Nakamoto is a master of Japanese cuisine with over 20 years of experience. He has worked in some of the top restaurants in Tokyo and specializes in traditional dishes like sushi and sashimi.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook the rice and season with rice vinegar. 2. Lay the nori seaweed on a sushi mat. 3. Spread the rice on the nori, leaving a small border at the top. 4. Add the fillings and roll up the sushi. 5. Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
1. Marinate the beef in the soy sauce, mirin, sake, and brown sugar. 2. Grill the beef until cooked to your liking. 3. Serve with steamed rice and vegetables.
1. Mix the flour, cornstarch, and cold water to make a batter. 2. Dip the shrimp in the batter and deep-fry in hot oil until golden brown. 3. Serve with soy sauce and grated daikon.
